name: Chia Simulator
description:
This is a prototype about growing a chia pet, among other things.

you grow the chia by splashing water on it, you kill creatures with weapons and drop them in a chute to refuel a generator

current debug cmds:
press 1 to spawn a sluggy
press 2 to spawn a blob of oil

current controls:
E to pickup items 
Q to drop items
E on a non-item physics object to grab it
E to drop non-item physics object

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/zjrkStNRb7
